about_the_game:
In Submansion, you will travel through ten rooms in search of lost keys and an unvaliable thing. Your guide will be the Keykeeper. At first glance, a helpless lady who could not even cope with her main task - to keep the keys.

Game features:
- Visual novel with choices
- Multiple endings
- Point & click elements
detailed_description:
In Submansion, you will travel through ten rooms in search of lost keys and an unvaliable thing. Your guide will be the Keykeeper. At first glance, a helpless lady who could not even cope with her main task - to keep the keys.

- Point & click elements
name: Submansion Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Journey into a whimsical mansion in search of the invaluable thing, where Keykeeper will be your guide. Keykeeper has lost all her keys. You must find them to take your invaluable item.
